quote: It's better than sex. Reading delivers on the promise that sex raises but hardly ever can fulfill -- getting larger cause you're entering another person's language, cadence, heart and mind.
quote_letters: ITS BETTER THAN SEX READING DELIVERS ON THE PROMISE THAT SEX RAISES BUT HARDLY EVER CAN FULFILL -- GETTING LARGER CAUSE YOURE ENTERING ANOTHER PERSONS LANGUAGE CADENCE HEART AND MIND
